magicChords
===========

A simple javascript webapp to transpose chord charts. Will generate PDFs and print in a nice format too.

Example site - http://witchard.github.io/magicChords, e.g. [Strength Will Rise](http://witchard.github.io/magicChords/index.htm?page=input&key=G&title=Strength%20Will%20Rise%20%2F%20Everlasting%20God&desc=Brenton%20Brown%2C%20Ken%20Riley&)

Deps
----

* [jsPDF](http://jspdf.com) - MIT
* [jquery Chord Transpose](https://github.com/jessegavin/jQuery-Chord-Transposer) - MIT

License
-------

MIT
